text: Len Richardson (born 5 May 1950) is an Australian cricketer. He played eight first-class matches for New South Wales and Queensland between 1975/76 and 1976/77. ==See also== * List of New South Wales representative cricketers ==References== ==External links== * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Australian cricketers Category:New South Wales cricketers Category:Queensland cricketers Category:Cricketers from Sydney
title: Len Richardson (cricketer)
